category: Click Boards > Clock & Timing > Clock generator
name: mikroe.click.waveform2
short_description: Waveform 2 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a direct digital synthesis device for waveform generator applications. This board features the AD9834, a 75 MHz low power DDS device capable of producing high-performance sine/triangle/square outputs from Analog Devices. It provides the capability for phase and frequency modulation and has an on-board comparator that allows the production of a square wave signal for clock generation.
